蒞.definition: to attend (an official function); to be present; to administer; to approach (esp. as administrator)

蒞事者.definition: an official; person holding post; local functionary

蒞任.definition: to attend; to take office; to be present (in administrative capacity)

蒞會.definition: to be present at a meeting

蒞臨.definition: to arrive (esp. of notable person); to visit (more formal than 光臨|光临[guang1 lin2])

蒞臨指導.definition: (of a notable person etc) to honor with one's presence and offer guidance (idiom)
